doc.title: Blue, Bunny
doc.plot: Ingenue Corey has landed her breakout role in the latest opus written, produced, directed by, and co-starring bad-boy auteur Vic Salvestrin. Early one shooting morning, Corey discovers that Vic has made changes to the script - changes that require her to go far beyond the call of duty in her role as Iris, the love interest of Buck (played, coincidentally, by Vic). Young and uncertain of her place in her career, Corey struggles to find her personal and professional boundaries as Vic attempts to manipulate her into a very compromising position. All in the name of 'art.'
